content: **description** the make it blue cowl is beginner friendly and provides an extra touch of warmth to any cool-weather outfit it is worked top down in 2x2 ribbing with a simple slip selvedge for the front and back panels its small size also makes this an excellent scrap yarn project **video tutorial** you can also find a video tutorial for this sweater on my youtube channel https //youtu be/tadywxm3afi **suggested yarn** bulky weight yarn sandnes garn børstet alpakka in the color electric blue 6046 shown in pictures **yardage** approximately 150 meters/165 yards or 65 grams **needles** circular needles 5 mm us8 40 cm 16 inches or needles to meet gauge **gauge** 18 sts in 2x2 ribbing=10 cm with 5mm knitting needles or needles to meet gauge note row gauge is not needed in this pattern **dimensions** 35 cm/13 75in long by 25 cm/9 75 in wide
